actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for the Environmental Protection Agency to conduct the waste treatment construction grants program under section 201 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (deferral number D 80-65).

summary.text: Disapproves a specified portion of the proposed deferral of budget authority (D80-65) for Environmental Protection Agency grants for waste treatment works.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for the Environmental Protection Agency to conduct the waste treatment construction grants program under section 201 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (deferral number D 80-65).
